Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes a third-party vendor program to send certain packages to incarcerated individuals
Summary: Establishes a third-party vendor program of not more than 10 vendors to send certain packages to incarcerated individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation establishing a third-party vendor program to send certain packages to incarcerated individuals
